summary.span: 表示 Windows NT 性能计数器组件。

span.span: Represents a Windows NT performance counter component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件可用于读取现有预定义或自定义计数器，以及向自定义计数器发布（写入）性能数据。The component can be used for both reading existing predefined or custom counters and publishing (writing) performance data to custom counters. Windows 性能监视器的 "[添加计数器" 对话框](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=257854)中列出了许多预定义的计数器。There are numerous predefined counters listed in the Windows Performance Monitor's [Add Counters dialog box](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=257854). 若要了解 .NET Framework 性能计数器，请参阅[性能计数器](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/performance-counters.md)。To learn about the .NET Framework performance counters, see [Performance Counters](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/performance-counters.md). 此类型实现 接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在 `try`/ 块中调用其 `catch` 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 和1.1 中，此类要求直接调用方完全受信任。In versions 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, this class requires immediate callers to be fully trusted. 从 .NET Framework 版本2.0 开始，此类需要 特定操作。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this class requires for specific actions. 强烈建议不要将 授予完全受信任的代码。It is strongly recommended that not be granted to semi-trusted code. 读取和写入性能计数器的功能允许代码执行一些操作，例如枚举执行进程和获取有关它们的信息。The ability to read and write performance counters allows code to perform actions such as enumerating executing processes and obtaining information about them. > > 此外，将 对象传递给不受信任的代码可能会造成安全问题。In addition, passing a object to less-trusted code can create a security issue. 永远不会将性能计数器对象（如 或 ）传递给不太受信任的代码。Never pass performance counter objects, such as a or , to less trusted code. 若要从性能计数器读取，请创建 类的实例，并根据需要设置 、和 或 属性，然后调用 方法来执行性能计数器读取。To read from a performance counter, create an instance of the class, set the , , and, optionally, the or properties, and then call the method to take a performance counter reading. 若要发布性能计数器数据，请使用 方法创建一个或多个自定义计数器，创建 类的实例，设置 、 和（可选） 或 属性，然后调用 、或 方法，或设置 属性以更改自定义计数器的值。To publish performance counter data, create one or more custom counters using the method, create an instance of the class, set the , and, optionally, or properties, and then call the , , or methods, or set the property to change the value of your custom counter. > [!NOTE] > 、和 方法使用 interlocks 更新计数器值。The , , and methods use interlocks to update the counter value. 这有助于在多线程或多进程方案中保持计数器值的准确性，但也会导致性能下降。This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty. 如果不需要联锁操作提供的准确性，可以直接更新 属性，使性能提高5倍。If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement. 但在多线程方案中，对计数器值的某些更新可能会被忽略，导致数据不准确。However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data. 计数器是收集性能数据时所依据的机制。The counter is the mechanism by which performance data is collected. 注册表存储所有计数器的名称，其中每个计数器都与系统功能的特定区域相关。The registry stores the names of all the counters, each of which is related to a specific area of system functionality. 例如，处理器的繁忙时间、内存使用情况或通过网络连接接收的字节数。Examples include a processor's busy time, memory usage, or the number of bytes received over a network connection. 每个计数器都是通过其名称和位置唯一标识的。Each counter is uniquely identified through its name and its location. 与文件路径包含驱动器、目录、一个或多个子目录以及文件名一样，计数器信息由以下四个元素组成： "计算机"、"类别"、"类别实例" 和 "计数器名称"。In the same way that a file path includes a drive, a directory, one or more subdirectories, and a file name, counter information consists of four elements: the computer, the category, the category instance, and the counter name. 计数器信息必须包含计数器测量数据的类别或性能对象。The counter information must include the category, or performance object, that the counter measures data for. 计算机的类别包括物理组件，如处理器、磁盘和内存。A computer's categories include physical components, such as processors, disks, and memory. 还有系统类别，如进程和线程。There are also system categories, such as processes and threads. 每个类别都与计算机内的某个功能元素相关，并为其分配了一组标准计数器。Each category is related to a functional element within the computer and has a set of standard counters assigned to it. 这些对象列在 Windows 2000 系统监视器中 "添加计数器" 对话框的 "性能对象" 下拉列表中，并且必须将它们包含在计数器路径中。These objects are listed in the Performance object drop-down list of the Add Counters dialog box within the Windows 2000 System Monitor, and you must include them in the counter path. 性能数据按与其相关的类别进行分组。Performance data is grouped by the category to which is it related. 在某些情况下，可能存在同一类别的多个副本。In certain cases, several copies of the same category can exist. 例如，多个进程和线程同时运行，某些计算机则包含多个处理器。For example, several processes and threads run simultaneously, and some computers contain more than one processor. 类别副本称为类别实例，每个实例都有一组分配给它的标准计数器。The category copies are called category instances, and each instance has a set of standard counters assigned to it. 如果一个类别可以有多个实例，则计数器信息中必须包括一个实例规范。If a category can have more than one instance, an instance specification must be included in the counter information. 若要获取需要初始值或前一个值来执行必要的计算的计数器的性能数据，请调用 方法两次，并使用根据应用程序需要返回的信息。To obtain performance data for counters that required an initial or previous value for performing the necessary calculation, call the method twice and use the information returned as your application requires. > [!NOTE] > 随 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] 一起安装的性能计数器类别使用单独的共享内存，其中每个性能计数器类别都有自己的内存。Performance counter categories installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] use separate shared memory, with each performance counter category having its own memory. 可以通过在注册表项 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE \SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\*\<类别名称 >* \Performance. 中创建名为 FILEMAPPINGSIZE 的 DWORD，来指定单独的共享内存的大小。You can specify the size of separate shared memory by creating a DWORD named FileMappingSize in the registry key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\*\* \Performance. FileMappingSize 值设置为类别的共享内存大小。The FileMappingSize value is set to the shared memory size of the category. 默认大小为131072。The default size is 131072 decimal. 如果 FileMappingSize 值不存在，则使用 Machine.config 文件中指定的 `performanceCounters` 元素的 `fileMappingSize` 属性值，从而导致配置文件处理的额外开销。If the FileMappingSize value is not present, the `fileMappingSize` attribute value for the `performanceCounters` element specified in the Machine.config file is used, causing additional overhead for configuration file processing. 可以通过在注册表中设置文件映射大小来实现对应用程序启动的性能改进。You can realize a performance improvement for application startup by setting the file mapping size in the registry. 有关文件映射大小的详细信息，请参阅[<performanceCounters>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/performancecounters-element.md)。For more information about the file mapping size, see [<performanceCounters>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/performancecounters-element.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类来创建和使用 计数器类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to create and use an counter type. 该示例创建类别、设置计数器、收集计数器中的数据，并调用 类来解释性能计数器数据。The example creates categories, sets up counters, collects data from the counters, and calls the class to interpret the performance counter data. 中间结果和最终结果将显示在控制台窗口中。The intermediate and final results are displayed in the console window. 有关其他性能计数器类型的其他示例，请参阅 枚举。For additional examples of other performance counter types, see the enumeration. [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CPP/averagecount32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CS/averagecount32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/VB/averagecount32.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数的此重载将 、和 属性设置为空字符串（""），并将 属性设置为本地计算机（"."）。This overload of the constructor sets the , , and properties to empty strings (""), and sets the property to the local computer, ("."). 此构造函数不会初始化性能计数器，因此它不会将该实例与本地计算机上的现有计数器关联。This constructor does not initialize the performance counter, so it does not associate the instance with an existing counter on the local computer. 若要指向特定的性能计数器，请在读取任何其他属性或尝试读取计数器之前，设置 、和（可选） 和 属性。To point to a specific performance counter, set the , , and, optionally, the and properties before reading any other properties or attempting to read from a counter. 若要写入性能计数器，请将 属性设置为 `false`。To write to a performance counter, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 应用于此成员的 特性具有以下 属性值： | 。The attribute applied to this member has the following property value: | . 不影响桌面应用程序（通常通过双击图标、键入命令或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动这些应用程序）。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 有关详细信息，请参阅 类或[SQL Server 编程和宿主保护属性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建 类的默认实例。The following code example creates a default instance of the class. 创建实例后，将设置 、和 属性值，并显示对 方法的调用结果。After the instance is created, the , , and property values are set, and the results of a call to the method are displayed. [!code-cpp[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/CPP/perfcounter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/CS/perfcounter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/VB/perfcounter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数字符串不区分大小写。The parameter strings are not case-sensitive. 使用此重载来访问本地计算机上的计数器，该计数器属于包含单个性能计数器类别实例的类别。Use this overload to access a counter on the local computer that belongs to a category containing a single performance counter category instance. 如果尝试使用此构造函数将此 实例指向包含多个实例的类别，则构造函数将引发异常。If you attempt to use this constructor to point this instance to a category that contains multiple instances, the constructor throws an exception. 此重载可以访问任何只读或读/写计数器，但会在只读模式下进行访问。This overload can access any read-only or read/write counter, but does so in a read-only mode. 使用此重载创建的 实例无法写入该计数器，即使该计数器本身是可读/写的。A instance created using this overload cannot write to the counter, even if the counter itself is read/write. 构造函数的此重载将 和 属性设置为传入的值，将 属性设置为本地计算机 "."，并将 属性设置为空字符串（""）。This overload of the constructor sets the and properties to the values you pass in, sets the property to the local computer, ".", and sets the property to an empty string (""). 此构造函数初始化性能计数器，并将该实例与本地计算机上的现有计数器（系统或自定义计数器）相关联。This constructor initializes the performance counter and associates the instance with an existing counter (either a system or a custom counter) on the local computer. 为 "" 和 "" 属性传入的值必须指向本地计算机上的现有性能计数器。The values that you pass in for the and properties must point to an existing performance counter on the local computer. > [!NOTE] > 若要在 Windows Vista、Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中读取性能计数器，你必须是 "性能监视器用户" 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免提升权限来访问 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到性能监视器用户组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，必须首先将你的特权从标准用户提升到管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数字符串不区分大小写。The parameter strings are not case-sensitive. 使用此重载访问本地计算机上的只读或读/写计数器，该计数器属于包含单个性能计数器类别实例的类别。Use this overload to access a read-only or read/write counter on the local computer that belongs to a category containing a single performance counter category instance. 如果尝试使用此构造函数将此 实例指向包含多个实例的类别，则构造函数将引发异常。If you attempt to use this constructor to point this instance to a category that contains multiple instances, the constructor throws an exception. 构造函数的此重载将 、和 属性设置为传入的值，将 属性设置为本地计算机 "."，并将 属性设置为空字符串（""）。This overload of the constructor sets the , , and properties to the values you pass in, sets the property to the local computer, ".", and sets the property to an empty string (""). 此构造函数初始化性能计数器，并将该实例与本地计算机上的现有计数器（系统或自定义计数器）相关联。This constructor initializes the performance counter and associates the instance with an existing counter (either a system or a custom counter) on the local computer. 为 "" 和 "" 属性传入的值必须指向本地计算机上的现有性能计数器。The values that you pass in for the and properties must point to an existing performance counter on the local computer. 如果指向的性能计数器实例无效，则调用构造函数将引发异常。If the performance counter instance that you point to is not valid, calling the constructor throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 您可以使用此重载连接到系统计数器，但无法写入系统计数器。You can use this overload to connect to a system counter, but you cannot write to a system counter. 因此，在连接到系统计数器时，将 `readOnly` 设置为 `false` 会导致构造函数引发异常。Therefore, setting `readOnly` to `false` when connecting to a system counter causes the constructor to throw an exception. > [!NOTE] > 若要在 Windows Vista、Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中读取性能计数器，你必须是 "性能监视器用户" 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免提升权限来访问 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到性能监视器用户组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，必须首先将你的特权从标准用户提升到管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建 类的实例。The following code example creates an instance of the class. 该示例传入类别名称、计数器名称和指示计数器不是只读的标志值。The example passes in category names, counter names, and a flag value indicating that the counter is not read-only. 此代码示例是 类的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数字符串不区分大小写。The parameter strings are not case-sensitive. 构造函数的此重载将 、和 属性设置为传入的值，并将 属性设置为本地计算机 "."。This overload of the constructor sets the , , and properties to the values you pass in, and sets the property to the local computer, ".". 此构造函数初始化性能计数器，并将该实例与本地计算机上的现有计数器（系统或自定义计数器）相关联。This constructor initializes the performance counter and associates the instance with an existing counter (either a system or a custom counter) on the local computer. 为 、和 属性传入的值必须指向本地计算机上的现有性能计数器。The values that you pass in for the , , and properties must point to an existing performance counter on the local computer. 如果指向的性能计数器实例无效，则调用构造函数将引发异常。If the performance counter instance you point to is not valid, calling the constructor throws an exception. 此重载可以访问任何只读或读/写计数器，但会在只读模式下进行访问。This overload can access any read-only or read/write counter, but does so in a read-only mode. 使用此重载创建的 实例无法写入该计数器，即使该计数器本身是可读/写的。A instance created using this overload cannot write to the counter, even if the counter itself is read/write. 若要创建性能类别实例，请在 构造函数上指定 `instanceName`。To create a performance category instance, specify an `instanceName` on the constructor. 如果 `instanceName` 指定的类别实例已存在，则新的对象将引用现有的类别实例。If the category instance specified by `instanceName` already exists the new object will reference the existing category instance. > [!NOTE] > 若要在 Windows Vista、Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中读取性能计数器，你必须是 "性能监视器用户" 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免提升权限来访问 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到性能监视器用户组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，必须首先将你的特权从标准用户提升到管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.

此构造函数初始化性能计数器，并将该实例与指定计算机上的现有计数器（系统或自定义计数器）相关联。This constructor initializes the performance counter and associates the instance with an existing counter (either a system or a custom counter) on the specified computer. 为 、、 和 属性传入的值必须指向现有性能计数器。The values that you pass in for the , , and properties must point to an existing performance counter. 如果指向的性能计数器实例无效，则调用构造函数将引发异常。If the performance counter instance you point to is not valid, calling the constructor throws an exception. 此重载可以访问任何只读或读/写计数器，但会在只读模式下进行访问。This overload can access any read-only or read/write counter, but does so in a read-only mode. 使用此重载创建的 实例无法写入该计数器，即使该计数器本身是可读/写的。A instance created using this overload cannot write to the counter, even if the counter itself is read/write. > [!NOTE] > 不能写入远程性能计数器。You cannot write to remote performance counters. 没有任何重载允许您指定连接到远程计算机的 类的读/写实例。There is no overload that allows you to specify a read/write instance of the class that connects to a remote computer. 若要创建性能类别实例，请在 构造函数上指定 `instanceName`。To create a performance category instance, specify an `instanceName` on the constructor. 如果 `instanceName` 指定的类别实例已存在，则新的对象将引用现有的类别实例。If the category instance specified by "性能监视器用户" 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免提升权限来访问 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到性能监视器用户组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，必须首先将你的特权从标准用户提升到管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，当远程计算机是工作组的成员时，您可能需要禁用 UAC，以便不筛选本地用户帐户，并将其提升为管理员帐户。In Windows Vista, when the remote computer is a member of a workgroup, you may need to disable UAC so that the local user account is not filtered and can be elevated to an administrator account. 出于安全原因，禁用 UAC 应该是最后一种手段。For security reasons, disabling UAC should be a last resort. 有关禁用 UAC 的信息，请参阅[用户帐户控制和 WMI](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=91617)。For information on disabling UAC, see [User Account Control and WMI](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=91617).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 穦 `Performance Object`字段的性能计数器管理器 MMC 管理单元中的`Add Counter`对话框。The is displayed in the `Performance Object` field of Performance Counter Manager MMC snap in's `Add Counter` dialog box. 性能计数器监视计算机上类别或性能对象的行为。A performance counter monitors the behavior of a category, or performance object, on a computer. 类别包括物理组件（如处理器、磁盘和内存）以及系统对象（如进程和线程）。Categories include physical components (such as processors, disks, and memory) and system objects (such as processes and threads). 与相同性能对象相关的系统计数器将分组到一个指示它们常见焦点的类别。System counters that are related to the same performance object are grouped into a category that indicates their common focus. 当您创建 类的实例时，您首先指定组件将与之交互的类别，然后从该类别中选择一个计数器。When you create an instance of the class, you first indicate the category with which the component will interact, and then you choose a counter from that category. 例如，一个 Windows 计数器类别为内存类别。For example, one Windows counter category is the Memory category. 此类别中的系统计数器跟踪内存数据，如可用字节数和缓存的字节数。System counters within this category track memory data such as the number of bytes available and the number of bytes cached. 如果要处理缓存在应用程序中的字节，请创建 组件的实例，将其连接到内存类别，然后从该类别中选择相应的计数器（在本例中为缓存的字节数）。If you wanted to work with the bytes cached in your application, you would create an instance of the component, connect it to the Memory category, and then pick the appropriate counter (in this case, Cached Bytes) from that category. 尽管你的系统提供了更多的计数器类别，但你可能会经常与之交互的类别包括缓存、内存、对象、PhysicalDisk、进程、处理器、服务器、系统和线程类别。Although your system makes many more counter categories available, the categories that you will probably interact with most frequently are the Cache, Memory, Objects, PhysicalDisk, Process, Processor, Server, System, and Thread categories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建 类的默认实例。The following code example creates a default instance of the class. 创建实例后，将设置 、和 属性值，并显示对 方法的调用结果。After the instance is created, the , , and property values are set, and the results of a call to the method are displayed. [!code-cpp[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/CPP/perfcounter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/CS/perfcounter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/VB/perfcounter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 性能计数器管理器 MMC 管理单元的 "添加计数器" 对话框在用户从计数器列表中选择计数器并单击 "解释" 按钮时显示 文本。The Add Counters dialog box of the Performance Counter Manager MMC snap in displays the text when a user selects a counter from the counters list and clicks the Explain button. 创建新计数器时，请使用 文本来描述计数器监视器执行的操作，以便用户可以确定是否要将该计数器添加到系统监视器的显示内容中。When you create a new counter, use the text to describe what the counter monitors do so the user can determine whether to add the counter to the System Monitor's display. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性的值，并且使用 .NET Framework 版本1.0 或1.1 创建了性能计数器类别，则将引发 。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别使用全局共享内存，并且必须 的值。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果在 .NET Framework 的版本1.0 或1.1 上运行的应用程序未使用该类别，请删除并重新创建该类别。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category. > [!NOTE] > 若要在 Windows Vista、Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中读取性能计数器，你必须是 "性能监视器用户" 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免提升权限来访问 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到性能监视器用户组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，必须首先将你的特权从标准用户提升到管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举包含可与之交互的性能计数器类型。The enumeration contains the types of performance counters that you can interact with. 某些计数器类型表示计算所得的值，例如系统所采用的计数器度量值的平均值。Some of the counter types represent calculated values, such as the average of the counter measurements the system has taken. 其他类型表示原始值或未计算的值。Other types represent raw, or uncalculated, values. 下表显示了将与最常交互的计数器类型。The following table shows the counter types that you will interact with most frequently. |计数器的责任Counter's Responsibility|PerformanceCounterType 值PerformanceCounterType Value|示例Example| |------------------------------|----------------------------------|-------------| |维护项或操作的简单计数。Maintain a simple count of items or operations.|`NumberOfItems32`|跟踪作为32位整数收到的订单数。Tracking the number of orders received as a 32-bit integer.| |维护更高容量的简单计数。Maintain a higher-capacity simple count.|`NumberOfItems64`|跟踪容量非常大、存储为64位整数的站点的订单数。Tracking the number of orders for a site with very high volume, stored as a 64-bit integer.| |跟踪每秒项或操作的数量。Track the number of items or operations per second.|`RateOfCountsPerSecond32`|跟踪站点上每秒接收的订单数。Tracking orders received per second on a site.| |跟踪每秒更大容量的项或操作。Track a higher-capacity number of items or operations per second.|`RateOfCountsPerSecond64`|跟踪每秒在容量非常大的站点上收到的订单。Tracking orders received per second on a site with very high volume.| |计算执行进程或处理项的平均时间Calculate the average time to perform a process or to process an item|`AverageTimer32`|计算订单处理的平均时间。Calculate the average time an order takes to be processed.| 如果创建的计数器的类型需要使用相应的基本计数器，则必须在传递到 方法的 中声明该计数器和基。When you create a counter whose type requires the use of a corresponding base counter, you must declare the counter and the base in the you pass into the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性的值，并且使用 .NET Framework 版本1.0 或1.1 创建了性能计数器类别，则将引发 。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an 上运行的应用程序未使用该类别，请删除并重新创建该类别。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category. > [!NOTE] > 若要在 Windows Vista、Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中读取性能计数器，你必须是 "性能监视器用户" 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免提升权限来访问 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到性能监视器用户组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，必须首先将你的特权从标准用户提升到管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能写入自定义计数器。You can write only to custom counters. 所有系统计数器均为只读。All system counters are read-only. > [!NOTE] > 、和 方法使用 interlocks 更新计数器值。The , , and methods use interlocks to update the counter value. 这有助于在多线程或多进程方案中保持计数器值的准确性，但也会导致性能下降。This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty. 如果不需要联锁操作提供的准确性，可以直接更新 属性，使性能提高5倍。If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement. 但在多线程方案中，对计数器值的某些更新可能会被忽略，导致数据不准确。However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性的值，并且使用 .NET Framework 版本1.0 或1.1 创建了性能计数器类别，则将引发 。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别使用全局共享内存，并且必须 的值。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果在 .NET Framework 的版本1.0 或1.1 上运行的应用程序未使用该类别，请删除并重新创建该类别。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能写入自定义计数器。You can write only to custom counters. 所有系统计数器均为只读。All system counters are read-only. > [!NOTE] > 、和 方法使用 interlocks 更新计数器值。The , , and methods use interlocks to update the counter value. 这有助于在多线程或多进程方案中保持计数器值的准确性，但也会导致性能下降。This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty. 如果不需要联锁操作提供的准确性，可以直接更新 属性，使性能提高5倍。If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement. 但在多线程方案中，对计数器值的某些更新可能会被忽略，导致数据不准确。However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性的值，并且使用 .NET Framework 版本1.0 或1.1 创建了性能计数器类别，则将引发 。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别使用全局共享内存，并且必须 的值。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果在 .NET Framework 的版本1.0 或1.1 上运行的应用程序未使用该类别，请删除并重新创建该类别。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能写入自定义计数器。You can write only to custom counters. 所有系统计数器均为只读。All system counters are read-only. > [!NOTE] > 、和 方法使用 interlocks 更新计数器值。The , , and methods use interlocks to update the counter value. 这有助于在多线程或多进程方案中保持计数器值的准确性，但也会导致性能下降。This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty. 如果不需要联锁操作提供的准确性，可以直接更新 属性，使性能提高5倍。If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement. 但在多线程方案中，对计数器值的某些更新可能会被忽略，导致数据不准确。However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性的值，并且使用 .NET Framework 版本1.0 或1.1 创建了性能计数器类别，则将引发 。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别使用全局共享内存，并且必须 的值。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果在 .NET Framework 的版本1.0 或1.1 上运行的应用程序未使用该类别，请删除并重新创建该类别。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法为计数器添加增量。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to add increments to a counter. 此代码示例是 类的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置此性能计数器的实例名称。

span.span: Gets or sets an instance name for this performance counter.

value.span: 性能计数器类别实例的名称，或者为空字符串 ("")（如果该计数器是单实例计数器）。

span.span: The name of the performance counter category instance, or an empty string (""), if the counter is a single-instance counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 实例名称长度必须少于128个字符。Instance names must be shorter than 128 characters in length. 在某些情况下，类别将细分为多个实例，这些实例跟踪与类别相关的对象的多个匹配项的数据。In some situations, categories are subdivided into instances, which track data about multiple occurrences of the object that a category relates to. 实例作为整体应用于类别，而不是应用于单个计数器。Instances apply to the category as whole, rather than to individual counters. 类别中的每个计数器都有为该类别定义的每个实例。Every counter within a category has each instance defined for the category. 例如，"进程" 类别包含名为 "空闲" 和 "系统" 的实例。For example, the Process category contains instances named Idle and System. 进程类别中的每个计数器都包含每个实例的数据，并显示有关空闲进程或系统进程的信息。Every counter within the Process category thus contains data for each instance, showing information about either idle processes or system processes. 许多类别不包含多个实例，因此您可以将此属性保留为空，以指示没有实例与该类别关联。Many categories do not contain multiple instances, so you can leave this property empty to indicate that no instance is associated with the category. 如果此 实例指向非自定义类别，则只能从现有类别实例中进行选择。If this instance points to a noncustom category, you can choose from only the existing category instances. 您只能在自定义类别中创建新类别实例，这允许您根据需要定义任意数量的计数器和类别实例。You can create new category instances only in custom categories, which allow you to define as many counters and category instances as you need. 若要创建性能类别实例，请在 构造函数上指定 `instanceName`。To create a performance category instance, specify an `instanceName` on the constructor. 如果 `instanceName` 指定的类别实例已存在，则新的对象将引用现有的类别实例。If the category instance specified by `instanceName` already exists the new object will reference the existing category instance. > [!NOTE] > 在实例名称中不要使用字符 "（"、"）"、"#"、"\\" 或 "/"。Do not use the characters "(", ")", "#", "\\", or "/" in the instance name. 如果使用其中的任何字符，则性能控制台（请参阅[运行时分析](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/runtime-profiling.md)）可能无法正确显示实例值。If any of these characters are used, the Performance Console (see [Runtime Profiling](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/runtime-profiling.md)) may not correctly display the instance values. 如果实例名称是自动生成的，并且可能包含字符 "（"、"）"、"#"、"\\" 或 "/"，请使用下表中的字符映射。If the instance name is automatically generated and might contain the characters "(", ")", "#", "\\", or "/", use the character mapping in the following table. |字符Character|映射字符Mapped character| |---------------|----------------------| |((|[[| |))|]]| |#|__| |\|_\|_| |/|__| 从 属性获取的 对象的 属性是可能包含无效字符的实例名称的常见源。The property of the object obtained from the property is a common source of instance names that can contain invalid characters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建 类的默认实例。The following code example creates a default instance of the class. 创建实例后，将设置 、和 属性值，并显示对 方法的调用结果。After the instance is created, the , , and property values are set, and the results of a call to the method are displayed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您只能向驻留在本地计算机上的计数器写入值。You can write values only to counters that reside on the local computer. 但是，你可以从企业中具有访问权限的任何计算机读取计数器值。However, you can read counter values from any computer in the enterprise for which you have access privileges. 将 属性设置为指向远程计算机时， 实例将尝试打开该计算机上的计数器。When you set the property to point to a remote computer, the instance attempts to open the counter on that computer. 如果该计数器不存在，则设置此属性将引发异常。If the counter does not exist, setting this property throws an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通常用于包含未计算的值的计数器。This method is generally used for counters that contain uncalculated values. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性的值，并且使用 .NET Framework 版本1.0 或1.1 创建了性能计数器类别，则将引发 。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别使用全局共享内存，并且必须 的值。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果在 .NET Framework 的版本1.0 或1.1 上运行的应用程序未使用该类别，请删除并重新创建该类别。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category. > [!NOTE] > 若要在 Windows Vista、Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中读取性能计数器，你必须是 "性能监视器用户" 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免提升权限来访问 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到性能监视器用户组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，必须首先将你的特权从标准用户提升到管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来获取计数器的下一个未计算的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to obtain the next uncalculated value of a counter. 此代码示例是 类的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果计数器的计算值依赖于两个计数器读取，则第一个读取操作将返回0.0。If the calculated value of a counter depends on two counter reads, the first read operation returns 0.0. 重置性能计数器属性以指定另一个计数器等效于创建新的性能计数器，并且第一个使用新属性的读取操作返回0.0。Resetting the performance counter properties to specify a different counter is equivalent to creating a new performance counter, and the first read operation using the new properties returns 0.0. 建议调用 方法的延迟时间为1秒，以允许计数器执行下一个增量读取。The recommended delay time between calls to the method is one second, to allow the counter to perform the next incremental read. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取性能计数器，必须具有管理权限。To read performance counters, you must have administrative privileges. 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，必须首先将你的特权从标准用户提升到管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 计数器，并使用 方法在某个时间段内显示该计数器的值。The following code example creates an counter and uses the method to display the counter's values over a time period. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果计数器类型为32位，并且您尝试将此属性设置为一个太大而无法容纳的值，该属性会将该值截断为32位。If the counter type is a 32-bit size and you attempt to set this property to a value that is too large to fit, the property truncates the value to 32 bits. 在本地计算机上读取自定义计数器时，如果原始值足够，则使用 属性而不是计算值可以显著提高性能。When reading custom counters on the local computer, using the property rather than a calculated value can produce significantly better performance in scenarios where the raw value is sufficient. 如果要读取的计数器是只读的，则获取 属性会在调用属性时采样计数器。If the counter that you are reading is read-only, getting the property samples the counter at the time that the property is called. 此操作等效于初始调用 方法。This action is equivalent to making an initial call to the method. 如果随后调用 ，则可以对这两个调用返回的值执行计算。If you subsequently call , you can perform calculations on the values that both calls returned. 由于系统计数器是只读的，因此可以获取但不能设置其原始值。Because system counters are read-only, you can get but not set their raw values. > [!NOTE] > 、和 方法使用 interlocks 更新计数器值。The , , and methods use interlocks to update the counter value. 这有助于在多线程或多进程方案中保持计数器值的准确性，但也会导致性能下降。This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty. 如果不需要联锁操作提供的准确性，可以直接更新 属性，使性能提高5倍。If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement. 但在多线程方案中，对计数器值的某些更新可能会被忽略，导致数据不准确。However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性的值，并且使用 .NET Framework 版本1.0 或1.1 创建了性能计数器类别，则将引发 。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别使用全局共享内存，并且必须 的值。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果在 .NET Framework 的版本1.0 或1.1 上运行的应用程序未使用该类别，请删除并重新创建该类别。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category. > [!NOTE] > 若要在 Windows Vista、Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中读取性能计数器，你必须是 "性能监视器用户" 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免提升权限来访问 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到性能监视器用户组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard summary.span: 删除由 对象的 属性指定的类别实例。

span.span: Deletes the category instance specified by the object property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能删除自定义计数器的实例。You can remove an instance only for a custom counter. 所有系统计数器都是只读的，因此尝试删除其中一个计数器会引发异常。All system counters are read-only, so attempting to remove one of them throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 若要避免在释放性能计数器共享内存时可能出现的争用条件，建议从 事件处理程序中调用 方法。To avoid a possible race condition when the performance counter shared memory is released, it is recommended that the method be called from the event handler. 若要创建性能类别实例，请在 构造函数上指定 `instanceName`。To create a performance category instance, specify an `instanceName` on the constructor. 如果 `instanceName` 指定的类别实例已存在，则新的对象将引用现有的类别实例。If the category instance specified by `instanceName` already exists the new object will reference the existing category instance. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性的值，并且使用 .NET Framework 版本1.0 或1.1 创建了性能计数器类别，则将引发 。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别使用全局共享内存，并且必须 的值。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果在 .NET Framework 的版本1.0 或1.1 上运行的应用程序未使用该类别，请删除并重新创建该类别。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.
